inlineContent.text: Add a frameworks folder into the project and add GCVCardReader.framework and NFCReader.framework into it.
Add the frameworks into the project as dependencies and select “Embed and sign”.
Add Near Field Communication tag reading as a capability to the project. Include AppLicenseKey, Privacy key for NFC usage and ISO tags in the info.plist
Import the GCVCardReader framework into the required file and the public functions for nProbe and NFC Scan can be used can be used.

abstract.text: This article provides the list of steps that need to be followed to integrate the GCVCardReader framework into an app.

GCVCardReader is a framework used for the validation of emirates ID cards using the ICP server and extracting data from the card via the NFC chip. A PDF of the data extracted from the ICP validation is provided
